info.+content: イナズマイレブン アレスの天秤
Asuto Inamori's soccer club is disbanded after the school's soccer field is destroyed. He and friends go to Tokyo to attend Raimon-chuu (Raimon Junior High) to play soccer.
#1: "Teppen e Dasshu!" (てっぺんへダッシュ!; Dash to the top!) by pugcat's
#1: "Koisuru Otome wa Amamoyō" (恋する乙女は雨模様) by alom
